sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useRef } from 'react'; import { Helmet } from "react-helmet"; import { TiChevronLeft } from 'react-icons/ti'; import latticebackground from "../assets/images/lattice-background.png" import RealStateOrder from "./RealStateOrder"; const SingleConstruction = () => { const [showPlans, setShowPlans] = useState(false) const changehandle = () => { setShowPlans(true) }; return ( <> Arizona Resources - Acclaimed Home Warranty : Acclaimed Home Warranty

PLANS & PRICING

{showPlans ? :null} {/* {showPlans === "RealStateOrder" && } */} {/* {showPlans === "SingleConstruction" && } */}

Standard Features for all plans
*(service fee may be required)

HVAC

Air Conditioner/Cooler

Now No contract limits or unit limits

Heating System / Furnace

Heat pump

Thermostat

Duct from Heating or Cooling Unit

Plumbing

Toilets (Parts)

Drain line stoppages

Water Heater

Shower/Diverter Valves

Built-in Bath Whirlpool Motor & Pump Assembly

Plumbing Leaks (Water, Drain, Gas, or Vent)

Electrical

Electrical System

Panels and Subpanels

Junction Boxes

Exhaust Fans

Circuit Breakers

Ceiling Fans

Garage Door Systems

Appliances

Oven

Range

Cooktop

Dishwasher

Built in microwave

Garbage disposal

Trash compactor

Member benefits

Pre-Season Tune-Ups for Heating and A/C Units*

Re-Key Services

Filter delivery

Garage Reprogramming

Discounted Home Security

You've selected

Standard

New Home Warranty
|
$525
COVERAGE UPGRADES
SELECT ADDITIONAL ITEMS TO CUSTOMIZE YOUR PLAN
$200
Additional Air Conditioner/Cooler
$225
Premium Coverage Upgrade
(adds over 40 items to standard coverage)
$150
Refrigerator
$120
Additional Refrigerator/Freezer
$300
Enhanced External Pipe Leak Coverage
$465
Grinder Pump
$180
No-Fault Coverage
$300
Roof Leak
$150
Water Softener
$255
Washer/Dryer
$300
Septic System/Pumping
$150
Extra Water Heater
$255
Additional Heating/Furnace
$300
Roof Leak Repairs
$150
Discounted Service Call
$255
Washer & Dryer
$255
Booster Pump

Standard

Home Warranty $525
2x Air Conditioner/Cooler 2x Heating/Furnace 3x Refrigerator

Total Amount:

$525
) } export default SingleConstruction;
